data.title: The history and future of mines in Andalusia – DW – 08
data.meta_description: Andalusia’s mining industry has a history going back millennia – but largely came to an end in the early 2000s. The e-mobility boom and European hopes of greater materials self-sufficiency, however, has put the spotlight back on the mines.
data.text:
08/01/2024August 1, 2024

Andalusia’s mining industry has a history going back millennia – but largely came to an end in the early 2000s. The e-mobility boom and European hopes of greater materials self-sufficiency, however, has put the spotlight back on the mines.
